about_the_game:
Gokai Awesome Simulator + is a premium version of Gokai Awesome Simulator (now known as Gokai Awesome Simulator Lite) with tons of new content than the original! Originaly made by just Gokai on 2024, 05, 11, Gokai awsome simulator is a streamer/ game dev simulator where you can be a dude named Gokai doing awesome things in a simulator. This game is inspired by Bob-fnf simulator on scratch, You are Gokai, A dumbass with a computer and a dream, you can code*, stream*, set strangers into your home** and much more!! Find all the endings and be the most popular game developer/streamer ever!!!

*you cant actualy code and stream
**dont do thay in real life
-----------------------------------------------------------
NEW CONTENT
  • 16:9 display
  • Music player
  • more endings
  • new OST
  • and more!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 15
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: speaker
  • Additional Notes: Internet needed to play

name: Gokai Awesome Simulator +

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: speaker
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: You need internet to play this
